column1: A service in celebration of his life will be held on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 2:00 p.m. at Cherry Springs Baptist Church with Rev. Marty Connor and Rev. David Edwards officiating.  The family will receive friends from 1:00 ï¿½ 2:00 p.m. prior to the service at the church.  Burial will follow in Cherry Springs Memorial Park.
